name: Easy Bruschetta Recipe
description: This easy bruschetta recipe is a crowd-pleasing appetizer that comes together in no time! The combination of juicy tomatoes, garlic, fresh basil, and crispy ciabatta bread will make everyone come back for more!
recipeIngredient: 10 slices ciabatta bread, rustic bread, or baguette

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and dice the tomatoes. Place them in a medium-sized bowl. Finely chop the red onion and add them to the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and dice the tomatoes. Place them in a medium-sized bowl. Finely chop the red onion and add them to the tomatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the garlic and add it as well. Either tear or chop the basil and add it to the mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the garlic and add it as well. Either tear or chop the basil and add it to the mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the pine nuts in a small skillet without oil. Cook them for about 3 minutes over medium heat, until fragrant and lightly browned. Add the olive oil to the tomato basil mixture and stir. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the pine nuts in a small skillet without oil. Cook them for about 3 minutes over medium heat, until fragrant and lightly browned. Add the olive oil to the tomato basil mixture and stir. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut your bread into 1/2-inch thick slices. Heat a bit of olive oil in a pan (about 1-2 teaspoons) and cook it until crispy and golden. Alternatively, you could put the slices of bread on a grill.
